spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ayo casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 11}):

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Ayo can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ayo makes two Harpoon or Longbow attacks.

action.name: Harpoon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) piercing damage.
